data.title: C Site Execute Dart From C Long
data.description: Enable your teammates with this fast, strong dart when taking the C Site. You can combine your ultimate with the dart, Defenders will have a tough time keeping hold of site.

data.title: A Site Execute Dart from A Long
data.description: Enable your teammates taking the A Site with this dart, as you'll be able to clear most of site and the Short cubby on site.

data.title: C Long To Front C Default Shockbolt
data.description: This is useful for stopping players from peeking C Long from the back left side of Default on C Site.

data.title: Mid Courtyard To B Site Reconbolt
data.description: This is useful for revealing players in B Site including the immediate right and left side of the entrance of B Site, making it easier for you and your team to push in from Mid Courtyard.
